Type.Name: AccelMap

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccelMap extends GLib.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Global accelerator map for an entire application.
Docs.remarks: This class is a singleton; only one can exist at a time.

Docs.remarks: This is not typically used by C# code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddEntry (string accel_path, uint accel_key, Gdk.ModifierType accel_mods);
.method public static hidebysig void AddEntry(string accel_path, unsigned int32 accel_key, valuetype Gdk.ModifierType accel_mods) cil managed

Docs.summary: Registers a new accelerator with the global accelerator map.
Docs.remarks: This function should only be called once per with the canonical and for this path. To change the accelerator during runtime programatically, use . The accelerator path must consist of "<WINDOWTYPE>/Category1/Category2/.../Action", where <WINDOWTYPE> should be a unique application-specific identifier, that corresponds to the kind of window the accelerator is being used in, e.g. "Gimp-Image", "Abiword-Document" or "Gnumeric-Settings". The Category1/.../Action portion is most appropriately chosen by the action the accelerator triggers, i.e. for accelerators on menu items, choose the item's menu path, e.g. "File/Save As", "Image/View/Zoom" or "Edit/Select All". So a full valid accelerator path may look like: "<Gimp-Toolbox>/File/Dialogs/Tool Options...".

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddFilter (string filter_pattern);
.method public static hidebysig void AddFilter(string filter_pattern) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a filter to the global list of accel path filters.

remarks.para: Accel map entries whose accel path matches one of the filters are skipped by .
This function is intended for Gtk# modules that create their own menus but don't want them to be saved into the applications accelerator map dump.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ChangeEntry (string accel_path, uint accel_key, Gdk.ModifierType accel_mods, bool replace);
.method public static hidebysig bool ChangeEntry(string accel_path, unsigned int32 accel_key, valuetype Gdk.ModifierType accel_mods, bool replace) cil managed

Docs.summary: Changes the and currently associated with .
Docs.remarks: Due to conflicts with other accelerators, a change may not always be possible. The parameter indicates whether other accelerators may be deleted to resolve such conflicts. A change will only occur if all conflicts could be resolved (which might not be the case if conflicting accelerators are locked). Successful changes are indicated by a return value.

Docs.summary:
Loops over the entries in the accelerator map whose accel path doesn't match any of the filters added with
and executes on each.

Docs.summary: Loops over all entries in the accelerator map and executes * on each.

Docs.summary: Gets the singleton global. object. This object is useful only for notification of changes to the accelerator map via the internal "changed" signal; it isn't a parameter to the other accelerator map functions.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void LockPath (string accel_path);
.method public static hidebysig void LockPath(string accel_path) cil managed

Docs.summary: Locks the given accelerator path. If the accelerator map doesn't yet contain an entry for , a new one is created.

remarks.para: Locking an accelerator path prevents its accelerator from being changed during runtime. A locked accelerator path can be unlocked by . Refer to for information about runtime accelerator changes.

If called more than once, remains locked until
has been called an equivalent number of times.

Note that locking of individual accelerator paths is independent from locking the containing them. For runtime accelerator changes to be possible both the accelerator path and its have to be unlocked.
